Container.Name: Laverna
Container.Overview: [b]Laverna - note taking web app [/b][br] - Laverna is a JavaScript note-taking web application with a Markdown editor and encryption support. It's built to be an open source alternative to Evernote.[br] - The application stores all your notes in your browser databases such as indexedDB or localStorage, which is good for security reasons, because only you have access to them.[br] Live demo: [a href]https://laverna.cc/[/a][br]
